FN
ENGINE style=”font-weight:600;color:#4C4C4C;background-color:#FFCB05″>
Model & Type 101 hp@2200 rpm, DI, TCIC water cooled diesel engine.
TRANSMISSION style=”font-weight:600;color:#4C4C4C;background-color:#FFCB05″>
Type Heavy duty transmission for crane application. Synchromesh gearbox with auxillary gearbox, Eight forward and two reverse speeds with high and low selector.
AXLE style=”font-weight:600;color:#4C4C4C;background-color:#FFCB05″>
Front Rigidly mounted
Rear Mounted with two semielliptical springs.
Speed (Top) 42 kmph
Gradeability 35% unladen
Clutch Single plate, heavy duty dry friction type clutch plate especially designed for crane application.
Drive 4 wheel drive
STEERING style=”font-weight:600;color:#4C4C4C;background-color:#FFCB05″>
Type Articulated power steering, hydraulically controlled through two double acting hydraulic rams.
Articulation upto 40°
Turning Radius 7.0 m
BRAKES style=”font-weight:600;color:#4C4C4C;background-color:#FFCB05″>
Front & Rear Fully air operated ‘S’ cam dual circuit brakes on front & rear axles.
Parking Air operated fail safe brakes on front & rear wheels.
TYRES style=”font-weight:600;color:#4C4C4C;background-color:#FFCB05″>
Front & Rear 11.00×20 – 16 PR (8 Nos.)
Wheel Base 4 m
Wheel Tracks
Front & Rear 1830 mm (center of twin wheels)
BOOM style=”font-weight:600;color:#4C4C4C;background-color:#FFCB05″>
Telescoping 4 part boom, 3 part hydraulically powered & fully synchronised. 4th part power extended and manually pinned for safety.
Derricking Through two double acting cylinders.
HOIST MECHANISM style=”font-weight:600;color:#4C4C4C;background-color:#FFCB05″>
Hoist Six falls with fail safe brake.
HYDRAULIC SYSTEM style=”font-weight:600;color:#4C4C4C;background-color:#FFCB05″>
Pump Vane type hydraulic pump.
Control Valve 5/6 spool control valve double acting with built in pressure relief valve for trouble free operation.
ELECTRICAL SYSTEM style=”font-weight:600;color:#4C4C4C;background-color:#FFCB05″>
Type 12V, DC
OVER ALL DIMENSIONS style=”font-weight:600;color:#4C4C4C;background-color:#FFCB05″>
Length 10685 mm
Width 2670 mm
Height 3035 mm
OPERATING WEIGHT 14770 Kgs

[/et_pb_code][et_pb_button button_url=”https://www.indofarm.in/brochure/crane/Indo_Power_20FN_FNT.pdf” url_new_window=”on” button_text=”Download Brochure” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”gcid-a347593f-95af-4029-a172-1f48b6a83291″ custom_margin=”25px||25px||true|false” custom_padding=”||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{%22gcid-a347593f-95af-4029-a172-1f48b6a83291%22:%91%22button_text_color%22%93}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column_inner][/et_pb_row_inner][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”0px||2px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”2_5,3_5″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”50px|0px|50px|15px|true|false” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_css_main_element__hover_enabled=”off|desktop”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”2caebda7-1c6a-4d05-9d5d-92ad76e16d75″ header_font=”|700||on|||||” header_text_align=”left” header_text_color=”#21B354″ header_font_size=”3rem” header_letter_spacing=”5px” header_2_text_color=”#000000″ header_2_font_size=”1.5rem” header_2_line_height=”2.5rem” header_3_font_size=”3rem” background_color=”RGBA(255,255,255,0)” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”10%||||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”10%||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” header_font_size_tablet=”3rem” header_font_size_phone=”2rem” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_letter_spacing_tablet=”5px” header_letter_spacing_phone=”3px” header_letter_spacing_last_edited=”on|phone” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Indo power Crane

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Load capacity : 20 T
Boom Height: 19.59 m, 22.58 m with fly zib
Horizontal reach 17 m, 20.15 m with fly zib
Engine Power: 101 hp@2200 rpm
101 hp@2300 rpm

<!-- This site is optimized with the Yoast SEO plugin v25.2 - https://yoast.com/wordpress/plugins/seo/ -->
<title>INDO POWER 20FN | Indo Farm Heavy-Duty Drag Winch</title>
<meta name="description" content="High ground clearance, 4-part telescopic boom and a maximum capacity of 20T, this crane is powered with the BS-IV 101 HP engine." />
<meta name="robots" content="index, follow, max-snippet:-1, max-image-preview:large, max-video-preview:-1" />
<link rel="canonical" href="https://www.indofarm.in/equipment/indopower-20fn-fnt/" />
<meta property="og:locale" content="en_US" />
<meta property="og:type" content="article" />
<meta property="og:title" content="INDO POWER 20FN | Indo Farm Heavy-Duty Drag Winch" />
<meta property="og:description" content="High ground clearance, 4-part telescopic boom and a maximum capacity of 20T, this crane is powered with the BS-IV 101 HP engine." />
